replies.msg:
自己都有睇下英超波，我講講我睇法

大力神本身踢既位置多數係偏右
上季熱刺多數都係排鑽石陣同4231
一般上大力神都係鑽石陣踢正中場，4231多數踢右中場，又或者後啲既box to box中場
基本上熱刺本身上季個踢法
3個前鋒(傾, 兒子, 拳王)本身就係overload人地前面2個中堅，令對面防中都唔壓得太上
加上Trippier本身又係鍾意壓上，對面好自然右閘都係收得好後
所以無論大力神踢邊個位置，多數都有足夠空間去做波。
同埋佢餵波俾傾能力都幾高，當然都受惠傾既把握力。
大力神踢法唔係快，但係只要有空位，傳波控場餵波佢係做得唔錯。

干地其實仲好似未知佢個說明書，擺佢喺左面 本身佢一定唔會舒服。
擺佢3412個進攻中場，冇空位俾人逼就一定死火
擺佢352，中場線平排一齊壓落去，前鋒多數都係向中堅後面空位跑，佢冇空位又俾人針對，就好難等到時機餵波俾人。
同埋餵波嚟講把握力我地兩個前鋒都係中規中矩，呢幾場直情都死埋火。
基佬其實幾啱佢餵，但呢家買唔到就冇用啦，現實講有個伊卡迪喺度配合佢餵波真係唔同講法。

干地近期嘗試打433應該就係想摸下點用大力神，佢喺433既情況都至少好過踢三中堅既時候。
因為打三中堅既時候好多時我地中場係一對一，加上對前鋒喺正中路，假若對面打三後剩低個中堅就更加可以幫波做overload。
打433既時候對翼拉多咗空位，又唔會俾對面overload，佢有既空間多返啲啲，自然踢返好啲。
簡單啲講我地翼同閘都唔掂，中路球員一大堆但又唔係質素高，邊路打唔通，人地專心守中路就得。

Giroud: "I wanted to go to Inter. I already spoke with Conte."

This is the case of Olivier Giroud, who was linked to Inter and Lazio in January before remaining at Chelsea. The Frenchman spoke on these possible transfers with Tf1: "For me the most interesting project was the one with Inter; I already spoke with Conte and he coached me at Chelsea."

"I lived six difficult months and I wanted a change of air, but my club made the condition to find a replacement before letting me leave. I hoped until midnight on January 31 that I'd transfer in nerazzurro. Lazio came here to London to speak with the managers, but at the end I needed to understand that I'd be staying. Everything pushed back to June with Inter? Who knows..."

Romano discussed the possibility of an exchange between Inter owned forward Ivan Perisic and Bayern Munich midfielder Corentin Tolisso.

“At the moment this is a possibility that Inter are considering. It is not necessarily linked to the Perisic operation because Bayern is having a moment of reflection on loan deals and signings. Meanwhile Tolisso is an opportunity that Inter is still considering.”

The transfer market expert then discussed the future of the two wing backs that arrived for Inter in January, Ashley Young and Victor Moses.

“Young will stay for another year and will extend his contract, Moses has a chance but there is to deal with Chelsea and Inter will not spend too much, for example over €10 million, for the Nigerian. Inter assess left backs like Marcos Alonso and also more offensive wingers, including Chiesa.”

Finally, Romano spoke about the future of Inter owned striker Mauro Icardi, who is currently on loan with French giants Paris Saint Germain. The Parisians have an option to buy the Argentine striker for €70 million.

“Icardi may be worth less today due to the economic crisis, this is clear. But Inter were good to renew his contract a year ago before sending him to Paris and will still have room for maneuver even including possible exchanges for him. Lautaro to Barça is another possibility that must be linked to the post-Coronavirus crisis, €111 million is not spent as easily as it could have been two months ago.”

【Now Sports】20支意甲球會代表在周三進行視像會議，大部份同意於6月13日重啟。
新型冠狀病毒爆發後，意甲於3月暫停至今，賽會發聲明表示：「有關於復賽，6月13日這個日期獲得接納。」不過，他們仍然需要政府開綠燈，才能夠正式宣佈在該天重返戰陣。 意大利《羅馬體育報》指，預計在6月13日重啟後，每隊在一周將會出戰2場，將會在8月2日前完成。當中只有7月1日、22日兩個空檔，正好用來踢意大利盃準決賽次回合、決賽。 另外，意大利體育部長施柏達科拉周三宣佈，通過足總提出衛生指引調整，意甲所有球會都能夠在下周一，即5月18日，恢復集體操練。他又認為不能效法德乙特雷斯登僅隔離確診球員的做法。

With Dries Mertens set to extend his contract with Napoli after all, Inter are considering other options to bolster Antonio Conte's attack. The nerazzurri will likely intensify their pursuit of Edinson Cavani, while the former Napoli striker has a very significant salary, he could be signed on a Bosman deal. Inter had already contacted his representatives, but Mertens' decision will likely make him more of a priority.

However the pursuit of Cavani, is also likely tied to Lautaro Martinez. The negotiation with Barcelona for the Argentine striker has had it's share of ups and down, but there is still distance on the blaugrana's offer and Inter's demands. Barcelona do not want to pay the entire €111 clause and would like to include some players, at the moment Junior Firpo is more of a priority for Inter than Semedo.

Finally Alexis Sanchez is also determined to show Inter his worth in the final stretch of the season, his goal is to convince the nerazzurri to confirm him next season

Turkey international Caner Erkin, 31, joined Inter Milan in the off-season before 2016-17, right when de Boer was appointed as Roberto Mancini's replacement at the helm.

“I thought it was going to be my big career step - that I could play regularly, win trophies and earn the affection of the Inter fans,” said Erkin to FCInterNews.it.

“I didn’t want to leave Inter, not even when Roberto Mancini left, but Frank de Boer’s attitude towards me was awful.

"He left me out like I was some teenager promoted from the youth academy. It was unacceptable.

"Mancini played me in pre-season, he had faith in me and I was very sad when he left.

"The treatment I got from de Boer was totally disrespectful and he transformed my career path with his attitude.

“I never understood why de Boer treated me like that. I was never in his plans, from the first day he set foot in Italy. He left me out of the final pre-season match, then didn’t even let me participate in the training ground exercises. I had to train separately from the rest of the squad.

“I think he was trying to manipulate me into feeling so frustrated that I’d walk away. I just can’t explain it.

"Everyone knew what kind of person de Boer was, that’s why I still can’t figure out how he managed to reach a club like Inter.

“I agree with [former Inter teammate] Jonathan Biabiany when he says de Boer was the worst coach in the history of Inter.

"It’s awful that all my dreams were shattered by a man who was only there for two-and-a-half months.”

佢真係幾橙

Gianluca Di Marzio: “Negotiations Completely Blocked Between Inter & Barcelona Over Lautaro Martinez”

Inter have been very good at maintaining their stiff position, because even recently there have been important offers from Barcelona but Inter have always remained in their position,” transfer market expert Gianluca Di Marzio explained whilst present in the Sky Sport Italia studios this evening.

“To date Barça have failed to meet the demand of the Nerazzurri. The situation is totally blocked. Barcelona have not paid the €111 million clause or offered €90-95 million plus one player.

“Inevitably, the boy can be affected by these rumours but this does not mean that Lautaro has no respect for those who brought him to Europe. It is clear that the temptation of a move to Barcelona could have an affect but for now he will have to put his mind at rest and play.”

Inter are close to extending Marcelo Brozovic’s contract with the club according to a report from Italian broadcaster Sky Sport Italia, which was aired earlier on today.

The Croatian national team midfielder has become an absolutely pivotal player for Inter in recent seasons and his performances have not gone unnoticed with him having been linked with a potential move to Premier League outfit Liverpool.

Brozovic is currently under contract with Inter until the end of the 2021/22 season and the report explains that Inter hope to extend his deal by a further season until 2023.

Inter are also prepared to give the former Dinamo Zagreb player a salary increase as part of a new deal and reports elsewhere in the media have suggested that Inter wish to remove his €60 million release clause that is present in his current deal.

Hakimi has agreed terms to a five year deal with an annual salary of €5 million net, which is approximately €6.5 million in gross salary, taking into account things such as personal income tax, regional and municipal surcharges and social security contributions.

Considering his five year contract and the price of the deal being in the region of €40 million, his value against the club’s books will depreciate at a rate of €8 million.

Combining the salary costs and depreciation, the report explains that Hakimi will cost Inter in the region of €14.5 million a year.
